page.title: 02LOWER STOCK
page.content: My village is Lower Stoke. The High Street has 2 pubs which both play the old Kentish game of Bat & Trap. They are called the Nags Head and the Ship. The doctor's surgery only opens on Thursday mornings, a new surgery has been built in Allhallows. There is a newspaper shop and general grocery shop with a Do_it_yourself section, and a shoe shop opposite. Next door is a builders office and estate agent. The shop next door is the new post office. I live in Stone Cottage. I attend Stoke School and like it here. The pillar box is outside my window. Middle Stoke and Upper Stoke are also part of the village. The garage and chapel are at the bottom of School Hill. The village hall is just across the road.
